group.name: All Optional - Select only what you want

plugin.name: 1L Bottled Water Uses Split
plugin.description:
The 1L Bottled Water's uses have been adjusted from 3 to 5.
Each bottle still provides the same amount of total hydration, satiation, and radiation removal - just less per each use, now (60% compared to previous).
Compatible with FoodDrugDrink Animations. Will likely conflict with anything that changes drink items.
Alters item_drink.ltx

plugin.name: Companions Don't Ruin Disguises
plugin.description:
Extremely simple 2-line bugfix that stops companions from affecting the disguise system.
Best used alongside "he is with me", otherwise your companion(s) might start shooting at random people or other weird stuff.
Alters gameplay_disguise.script

plugin.name: Higher NPC Wounding Percent
plugin.description:
Human non-Monolith NPCs will enter the 'wounded' state at 30% total health instead of 20%.
Suited for players who typically set high bullet_hit_power in their game settings, but find it weird that a leg shot can kill a person outright.

plugin.name: Less NPC Jamming
plugin.description: Tones down NPC jamming to less-extreme levels, especially for more experienced STALKERs. It just seemed odd how an expert would be jamming every 10 rounds.

plugin.name: Longer NPC Loot Range
plugin.description: Increases the AI loot range from 35m to 50m to make them better about looting corpses. They will still abide by the loot exclusion distance in the settings menu.

plugin.name: Higher Surrender Chance + Faster Executes
plugin.description:
Increases the chance for an injured NPC to surrender to 45% (originally 25%).
Also makes NPCs much faster about putting down injured NPCs. This prevents the endless NPC strafing when a huge group is trying to execute a single injured guy.

plugin.name: Remove Grey Radiation Effect
plugin.description:
Gets rid of the grey radiation post-processing effect from entering radiation fields or getting close to 'old' mutants.
You do not need this if you use Arszi Radiation Overhaul.
Changes postprocess.ltx

plugin.name: Remove Mutant Auto-aim
plugin.description:
Removes auto-aim from the attacks of cats and pseudodogs. All other mutant types already had no auto-aim.
REQUIRES Soundscape Overhaul - Real Mutant Sounds. If you use this option, load this addon after Soundscape Overhaul.

plugin.name: Space+Shift Take-All and Shift+Single-Click-to-Take
plugin.description:
Changes the 'take-all' key combo to Shift+Space. Also changes menu functionality so that, while holding Shift, a single click on an item will transfer it between inventories or select it for buy/sell.
Full credit goes to MrAus10. (visit Discord addons page for their alt+click variant).

plugin.name: Suppressor Changes
plugin.description:
This changes how suppressors/silencers affect your weapon. Generally, they apply positive effects at the cost of increased maintenance. Thus, they are meant to be used by experienced STALKERs who can afford to pay the extra costs associated with them.
Adding a suppressor to your gun now applies the following:
+3% bullet speed +1% gun accuracy -18% hipfire recoil -18% aimed recoil +5% hipfire accuracy (stationary) -10% hipfire accuracy (moving) -15% hipfire accuracy (turning) 25% faster gun degradation (due to increased back-pressure and suppressor needing cleaning)
These are all easily editable in the .ltx file.

plugin.name: Talk to Everyone
plugin.description:
Allows you to talk to everyone, even if they aren't a squad leader. You can also trade and take quests from non-squad-leader NPCs.
Full credit goes to Dawn/Strider for their original fix for Anomaly 1.5.0.
